numpy >= 1.19.5
scipy >= 1.2.1, < 1.13.0
pandas >= 1.0.0
scikit-learn >= 0.20.0
tensorflow >= 1.15.0, < 2.16.0
torch >= 1.10.0
gensim >= 4.0.0
tqdm
nmslib ; python_version < "3.11"
dgl < 2.0.0 -f https://data.dgl.ai/wheels/repo.html
dataclasses ; python_version == "3.6"
recfarm ; python_version >= "3.7"
